description: MTND Exercício 4d: L = {ww^R | w ∈ {a,b}*} - Palíndromos de comprimento par
definition:
Estados: q0, q_find_end_a, q_find_end_b, q_match_a, q_match_b, q_back, qf, qreject
Alfabeto_Entrada: a, b
Alfabeto_Fita: a, b, X, _
Simbolo_Branco: _
Estado_Inicial: q0
Estado_Aceitacao: qf
Estado_Rejeicao: qreject
Transicoes:
q0, _, qf, _, S
q0, X, q0, X, R
q0, a, q_find_end_a, X, R
q0, b, q_find_end_b, X, R
q_find_end_a, a, q_find_end_a, a, R
q_find_end_a, b, q_find_end_a, b, R
q_find_end_a, X, q_find_end_a, X, R
q_find_end_a, _, q_match_a, _, L
q_find_end_b, a, q_find_end_b, a, R
q_find_end_b, b, q_find_end_b, b, R
q_find_end_b, X, q_find_end_b, X, R
q_find_end_b, _, q_match_b, _, L
q_match_a, X, q_match_a, X, L
q_match_a, a, q_back, X, L
q_match_a, b, qreject, b, S
q_match_b, X, q_match_b, X, L
q_match_b, b, q_back, X, L
q_match_b, a, qreject, a, S
q_back, a, q_back, a, L
q_back, b, q_back, b, L
q_back, X, q0, X, R
q_back, _, q0, _, R
